snippet.title: 🌊 Wave Break🌊 // Stadia Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wave Break will arrive first on the Stadia store this summer, and retail for $29.99 USD.  For more information, visit https://wavebreakgame.com

Skateboarding...on boats...with guns

Wave Break is set in a crime-filled, 1980s era Miami Vice inspired world, filled with outlandish characters, gorgeous environments, and a fresh synthwave soundtrack, where players can score massive points with sick trick combos, play with friends online, or enjoy the single player campaign mode. 

#FunktronicLabs #WaveBreakGame #Stadia

Find us on:
🌊 Funktronic Labs on Twitter: https://twitter.com/FunktronicLabs
🌊 Wave Break on Twitter: https://twitter.com/wavebreakgame
🌊 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/funktroniclabs
🌊 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/funklabs/
🌊 Discord: https://discord.gg/funktroniclabs
🌊 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/funktroniclabs
